text: Adiele Eberechuwku Afigbo (22 November 1937 â€“ 9 March 2009) was a Nigerian historian. He wrote about the history and historiography of Africa. Most of what he wrote was about Igbo people and Nigeria. He died in Enugu, Nigeria, on 9 March 2009. == References == Category:Nigerian writers Category:1937 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Historians
title: Adiele Afigbo
